name: A Kid's Dream
description:
You are a little boy collecting coins to achieve your dream. Collect them all and you go to heaven. Fail and well... Welcome to Hell, your new home.

A Kid's Dream is a 2d platformer game with an alternate ending. It is a metaphor in Winning and Failing. This game passed the University admission process back in 2012 putting me closer to my Dream.

Controls:  ⬅️+➡️ + spacebar + 's' if you get stuck! For some Tips, please read the ReadMe file.

▪️
